name: BartonellaQuintanaInfectionTestsForBartonellaQuintanaIgGOrTotalAntibodyInAClinicalSpecimenByAnyMethod
title: Bartonella quintana infection (Tests for Bartonella quintana IgG or Total Antibody in a clinical specimen by any method)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Bartonella quintana IgG or Total Antibody),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed),(Inclusion Criteria: Bartonella quintana IgG or Total Antibody),(Exclusion Criteria: None)
